title: 193: First Dates and Nipple Clamps w/ Malik B & Justin Elliott
itunes:title: 193: First Dates and Nipple Clamps w/ Malik B & Justin Elliott
description:
Today The Broads are joined by the hilarious comedians Malik B. and Justin Elliott! They discuss Postmate’s robots, paying on dates, finding love in an Uber Pool, first date ideas, how to first approach a love interest at Target, Justin being late to the podcast because he was tied up, Malik commenting on Real Housewive’s instagram pics, weddings, not sharing bank accounts, and a whole lot more! 


MALIK B. & JUSTIN ELLIOT: 


Follow Malik at: https://www.instagram.com/malikbazille/

Follow Justin at: https://www.instagram.com/justinuncut/


Check out their podcast “Cutting Weight” here and on Youtube and leave reviews here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/cutting-weight/id1492758279


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS AND THEIR DEALS!:


TALKSPACE - Talkspace.com code: CHATTY

FEETURES - feetures.com/CHATTY

FIGHT CAMP - Joinfightcamp.com/CHATTY

UQORA - Uqora.com/CHATTY


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
